headline: Here's Why Akamai Technologies (AKAM) Fell More Than Broader Market
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, Akamai Technologies (AKAM) stood at $99.35, denoting a -2.69% move from the preceding trading day.

headline: Viavi Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Rise Y/Y on Solid Demand
summary: VIAV's Q2 FY26 revenues jump 36.4% as NSE and OSP demand from data centers, 5G, and defense lifts results and beats estimate.
